publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2853 Mr Andy Kerr: Scottish Public Services Ombudsman Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Scottish Public Services Ombudsman Bill be passed. Supported by: Peter Peacock*
S1M-2853 Mr Andy Kerr: Scottish Public Services Ombudsman Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Scottish Public Services Ombudsman Bill be passed. Supported by: Peter Peacock
